explain: Compared to the rest of {companyName}, this is a significant number of leavers and {departmentName} has had peaks of muiltple people leaving around the same time.

advise: This would indicate that a specific change, project or person could have triggered this to happen. Try to look at the months before the peak and reflect on what could have triggered this.

That pattern could represent that a specific change, project or person might have been a factor in these departures. If you look back over the months before you might be able to determine what caused this spike.
